text: Campagne-lès-Wardrecques is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France. ==Geography== A village situated 5 miles (8 km) southeast of Saint-Omer, on theD200 road, near the junction of the N42 and N43 roads. The Neufosse Canal passes by the commune. ==Population== ==Places of interest== * The church of St.Martin, dating from the sixteenth century. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Campagneleswardrecques
title: Campagne-lès-Wardrecques
